DOC.detailed_description: The study include 40 post-deep peel woman ( exoderm ) , old 18 year old , treated dermatologist . The treatment group recieve 5 consecutive daily hyperbaric treatment , 1 hour long , 2 ATF , start day 7 peel . Prior treatment , patient sign informed consent complete physical examination . The control group match follow parameter : age , skin color type , indication peeling , pick dermatologist . Patients exclude know middle ear disease , chronic lung disease claustrophobia . Follow -up : The dermatologist follow-up , regular date : follow-up examination start day 1 mask\occlusive dress removal ( equivalent day 7 post-peel ) , day 7 , 28 , 3 month . All follow-up examination take place noon ( 04-08 pm ) regularly . Efficacy parameter : All patient ask fill daily questionnaire first week peel , score severity pain , pruritus tightness facial skin ( 1 5 ) . They also mention daily analgesic usage . Parameters evaluate dermatologist study : tightness skin , pain/burning , pruritus/stinging , swelling/edema , erythema , crust , scale , assess 4-point severity scale ( 0- best , 3- worst ) . Photographs : Photographs patient 5 angle view take day peel , day mask removal ( 7 ) , day 28 3 month .
